name: Floqer
tagline: The AI copilot for GTM data automation
description: Floqer lets RevOps and growth teams automate GTM data in seconds. Build multi-step workflows that detect relevant signals, enrich from 80+ sources, and trigger personalized outreach ‚Äì all without a single line of code.

name: Uneed Community
tagline: Launch, get seen, & grow alongside other makers
description: The new version of Uneed is finally here, and is called "Uneed Community" ‚ú® There are A LOT of changes in this release, and we won't be able to go through all of them. But the two most important ones are: üíÖüèª A complete redesign of the website üì∞ An X-like feed The idea is to slowly pivot Uneed from a simple launch platform to what we'll call a social launchpad. You'll be able to market your product every day, to give/ask for feedback, and more.

name: Jinna.ai
tagline: AI invoicing that creates, sends & chases for you
description: Jinna.ai is built to get you paid faster. Talk, type, or upload a file to create an invoice. Make it yours: add a logo, photo, video, signature, even music. Include bank details or a Stripe payment link for instant payment. Jinna sends it via link or crafts a friendly email to your client. When needed, she follows up automatically with smart AI chasing, simple reminder rules, and your chosen tone of voice and timing.

name: Firecrawl v2.5
tagline: The world's best Web Data API
description: Firecrawl v2.5 is the world's best Web Data API, powered by a new Semantic Index & custom browser stack. We deliver the highest-quality, agent-ready data, converting complex pages (PDFs, tables) into clean formats via our /scrape, /search, and /crawl endpoints.

name: Softr Workflows
tagline: Build automations to power your apps and business
description: Build automations, user interactions, and AI agents that power your Softr apps and business ‚Äî all in one place. Set up triggers, actions, and logic with a visual builder, or start fast with templates and an AI Co-builder.

name: Supernova.io
tagline: Build, document and hand-off features 10x faster
description: Today's vibe-coding tools let you explore ideas, but don't help with the rest of the real product process. So for people like you‚Äîwho brainstorm, document, iterate, collect feedback and collaborate as a team‚Äîwe built Supernova, a collaborative platform for product manager, designers and engineers that supercharges your workflows so you can deliver your next feature 100x faster, while staying true to your brand, design system and quality of your work.

name: Expertise Booking
tagline: Go Bananas with this AI Native Calendar
description: Expertise Booking is a powerful and intuitive scheduling tool designed to streamline how you book meetings, whether you‚Äôre working alone or as part of a team.

name: MCP Playground
tagline: Open-source MCP playground to test and introspect servers
description: MCP Playground is a web-based developer tool designed to inspect and test Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. It provides an interactive environment for exploring tools, resources, and prompts exposed by MCP servers, making it easy to debug and develop MCP integrations.

name: Whisper List
tagline: The World's First Ranking of VCs by Network Strength
description: VC rankings always focus on money - who returned the most, who invested the most, who has the most. But founders care about something else entirely, something supremely simple: can you help them build a billion dollar business? Introducing the Whisper List, the world's first ranking of VCs by the strength of their network. Discover which investors are connected where it counts - so you can see who can actually help you win.

name: EQUO
tagline: Explainable AI financial advisor for geeks.
description: Made by geeks for the geeks. EQUO is a multi-agent AI platform delivering personalized, explainable, and proactive financial guidance. We connect your accounts, understand your goals, and provide data-backed recommendations so that you can make smarter financial decisions with confidence.

name: WishfulMail
tagline: Write magical letters to Santa, the Tooth Fairy & others
description: WishfulMail lets kids safely write magical letters to Santa, the Tooth Fairy, the Easter Bunny and more ‚Äî while parents secretly receive the messages. It keeps childhood wonder alive in a private, COPPA-compliant, ad-free space built for families.

name: Lovelace
tagline: AI-powered cloud IDE for coding from anywhere
description: Lovelace is a browser-based AI IDE for developers who code from anywhere. It delivers AI-powered code completion, generation, and an integrated AI Agent across any device. The tool provides cloud-based workspace management from tablets, phones, or any browser. Lovelace helps developers review PRs during commutes, debug production issues remotely, or prototype ideas away from their main machine.

name: Structa
tagline: Design databases with AI, edit with clicks
description: Turn natural language into production-ready database schemas with visual ER diagrams. Unlike ChatGPT, Structa lets you edit with clicks, catches errors with validation warnings, and exports to SQL, Prisma, and TypeScript. Built in 3 weeks. Free to try.

name: Termdock
tagline: Terminal-centric AI development environment
description: Termdock is a terminal‚Äëcentric AI dev environment that unifies multi‚Äëworkspace management, multi‚Äëterminal layouts, and Git visualization in one interface. AST search (Tree‚Äësitter) lets you jump to symbols and dependencies instantly. Run up to 4 windows + PiP for Docker, Redis, logs, tests, and AI tools side‚Äëby‚Äëside. Drag‚Äëand‚Äëpaste images to CLI, with large text auto‚Äëcompression. Built‚Äëin file tree and prompt libraries keep workflows fast, consistent, and scalable.

name: Aritect
tagline: The all-in-one platform for actionable market intelligence
description: Aritect is positioned at the intersection of three powerful trends: increasing information overload, increasing market fragmentation, and increasing AI capabilities, aiming to navigate the complex decentralized finance landscape. The platform provides AI signals, instant alerts and clear visualizations to help users discover financial opportunities and convert AI capabilities into actual returns.

name: OptySleep
tagline: Sleep smarter: AI driven sleep insights based on your habits
description: OptySleep helps you discover what truly improves your rest. Run simple daily sleep trials, track habits and sleep quality, and get AI-powered insights from 8,000+ sleepers like you. No wearables, just science-backed guidance in minutes a day.

name: Moonlock
tagline: Mac antivirus that cares, not scares
description: Don‚Äôt you feel that cybersecurity apps have become too complex? Something we‚Äôre expected to trust blindly and never truly understand. Moonlock is here to make cybersecurity user-friendly. Finally, it‚Äôll speak, look, and feel human.

name: AI Agent Store by Robomotion
tagline: Browse, pick, and use AI agents for fun or productivity
description: Discover AI agents made for productivity and fun. From daily workflow helpers to creative companions, automate tasks, get ideas, or just play around with AI. New productivity and workflow agents are added every week to keep your toolkit growing!

name: Digital ID
tagline: Get your company's badges on Apple/Google Wallet
description: Get a copy of your work ID in your Google / Apple Wallet in 3 easy steps. No app install is required. We will give you the first Digital ID for free when you sign up.

name: QueryGold
tagline: High-intent search queries
description: Discover high-intent search queries that drive conversions
